item.title: .:whoami:.
item.description: About Us PGiatasti team was born during CyberChallenge.IT 2019 from the passion of some guys for the endless field of InfoSec. The philosophy of the team is based on the knowledge sharing and the continuous acquisition of new skills. We love to play CTF and become more and more skilled after every competition Goals In chronological order: 7th place at HITCONCTF 2020 with rhackomandati ðŸ¥ˆ place at molec0nCTF 2020 ðŸ¥‰ place at Reply Cybersecurty Challenge 2020 6th place at HexionCTF ðŸ¥ˆ place at AUCTF Tools RSArmageddon
